title: Pluralsight - Visual Studio Development on a Mac
description: This course introduces Visual Studio developers to Visual Studio development on a Mac. Apple Macs are consistently rated as the best laptops available and over the years Macs have become very popular at the enterprise level, an area previously dominated by Windows machines. However, many developers are not aware that Macs can be used for Visual Studio development at both the enterprise and independent levels. This course shows developers how to install and configure Windows on a Mac using the best technology options available. It will show developers how both platforms can be used together to enhance the Visual Studio experience
